title: What is the link between vaccines and autism?
description: Answer (1 of 40): A case of two effects stemming from the same cause. It's rather like the old joke that eating ice-cream causes shark attacks. From the mid 20th century onwards, health professionals began to pay a lot more attention to children's health and development, both mental and physical...
